LanguageData.AT_Scenario.scenario.label: New Anty Hive
LanguageData.AT_Scenario.scenario.description: New planets, new encounters, new wars, Anties are always travels in space hoping for these.\n\n But it's a step late, already on this planet, the Anties who have formed a large colony are fighting a stringless war. We need to lay the groundwork so that we can land as soon as possible and join the war.
LanguageData.AT_Scenario.scenario.summary: The story of three Anties who arrived to build a new Hive.
LanguageData.AT_Scenario_B.scenario.label: Anty Invasion-Hive
LanguageData.AT_Scenario_B.scenario.description:
It is an aggressor Hive that only engages in battle.

It becomes a permanent hostile state all forces except the Symbiotic-Hive and other Invasion-Hive. However, other Invasion-Hive also turn into hostile relations over time.

Do you want exchanges and negotiations? Prepare an acid solution and a big jaw!
LanguageData.AT_Scenario_B.scenario.summary: The story of the Anties who arrived to smash them all.
